review_data.title: Mezze with love to details & taste
review_data.content: Moudi is in a meantime a successful chain in Zürich. The concept works. This third or fourth location now takes #1 spot between all the Libanese restaurants in town. Top ingredients, good staff, large choice of tasty Mezze, nice atmosphere inside or outside on the...More

review_data.title: Tasty Mezze, probably the best in town
review_data.content: Tasty Mezze, probably the best in town! We have been coming here since it’s opened.. at lunch times it get’s really packed! Personally I like the leisurely atmosphere and the freshly made Mezze. Colourful and tasty. We can recommend the vegetarian Mezze plate and the...More

review_data.title: Worst mezze in town

review_data.title: Lovelly Mezze.
review_data.content: Nice place, fresh food, speedy service ,excelent for sharing. I recommend book a table in advance and visit the place with 3-4 people. Then you can order much more things and taste different options.

review_data.title: Ich komme wieder

review_data.title: Decent Lebanese, great service
review_data.content: Good location, with a very nice terrace The service was outstanding, the right mix of attention, speed, professionalism...without being intrusive Food was good but missed a wahoo factor (cant compare to Al Sultan in London for instance). But the labneh, hummus, tabouleh, haloumi were all...More

review_data.title: Outstanding (in almost everything)
review_data.content: We only can recommend this place, food is of highest quality, well prepared and presented, service like we have not often seen in Zurich - outstanding and good atmosphere in- and outside. When looking at this place, you would not guess that.

review_data.title: Top league Libanon
review_data.content: Certainly one of the best Libanonese restaurants in Zurich. Very good food! Particularly liked the aubergine dishes. Aesthetic presentation. Professional and friendly service. Tasteful interior deco. Don't miss this restaurant. Fairly priced.

review_data.title: Delicious, fair prices, and super nice service
